data: The ascending sun threw its slanting rays abroad on a glorious August morning, and the little world below began to awaken into lifeâ€”the life of another day of sanguine pleasure or of fretting care.
The ascending sun threw its slanting rays abroad on a glorious August morning, and the little world below began to awaken into life--the life of another day of sanguine pleasure or of fretting care.
